Flywheel.Description: Flywheels and battery storage systems are both used for storing energy and providing power when needed.
Flywheels can be integrated into smart grid systems to help manage and balance the supply and demand of electricity.
Flywheels can be used in conjunction with wind turbines to store excess energy generated during periods of low demand.
Flywheels can be used in electric vehicles to store and release energy, improving efficiency and range.
